means: 花招，诡计，骗人的玩意儿( gimmick的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The exhibition is informative, up to date, and mercifully free of gimmicks.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个展览既能让人增长见识，又紧跟时代前沿，而且幸运的是没有华而不实的东西。

sentence.Network_en: Financial institutions are also often expected yield of gimmicks.
sentence.Network_cn: 金融机构也往往以预期收益率为噱头.

sentence.Network_en: However these are just marketing gimmicks that propagate the myth.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而这些只是噱头的营销传播的神话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 借助工具的冷读（gimmicks）：手相(kino+冷读)、塔罗牌、ruin caste stones我不喜欢用这些额外的道具，也因为随身准备这些道具容 …
a perfectly rendered reality TV show atmosphere , reusing all the gimmicks of the genre !完全被回报的现实电视展示大气，重复利用风格的所有秘密装置！
“和杂耍人一样，我不使用小魔术（gimmicks）但是就像你看到的，有很多人，诸如Toecutte，迷男等等，可以很有效的运用魔术，我 …
the point of investment is not to provide students with gimmicks , but to drive home the message that technology can and should be used effectively .技术投资的意义并不在于为学生提供一些新奇的玩意，而是让他们明白，技术能够并且应当得到有效运用。

list.abs: The use of a scene and expressional gimmick , more outstandingMemory is the colour ., 这一段场景使用黑白的表现手法 , 更能突出是回忆的色彩.
在这份报告中，“回购105”操作被称为会计花招（accounting gimmick），甚至将雷曼破产与安然事件相提并论，由此引发了关于雷曼 …
He dismissed the event as just a publicity gimmick ., 他不理会这件事 , 只当它是一种宣传手法.
that's pretty much why it's a gimmick , since you only get a good five minutes of use out of it every hour .这几乎为什么这是一个噱头，因为你，只得到一个好的五年使用它每隔一小时分钟。

entry.tran: （引人注意或关注的）噱头，花招
entry.def: A gimmick is an unusual and unnecessary feature or action whose purpose is to attract attention or publicity.

example.ex: It is just a public relations gimmick...
example.tran: 这只不过是一种公关伎俩。

example.ex: The exhibition is informative, up to date, and mercifully free of gimmicks.
example.tran: 这个展览既能让人增长见识，又紧跟时代前沿，而且幸运的是没有华而不实的东西。

auth_sentence.content: This early adapter will introduce many now-familiar marketing gimmicks.
auth_sentence.res_content: This early adapter will introduce many now-familiar marketing gimmicks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This early adapter will introduce many now-familiar marketing gimmicks.

auth_sentence.content: But there's fundraising with dignity and then there's gimmicks.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there's fundraising with dignity and then there's gimmicks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there's fundraising with dignity and then there's gimmicks.
